```{r}
install()
library(fpp3)
library(fable.sepfit)

load_all()
model_data <- AirPassengers |>
  tsibble::as_tsibble() |>
  slice_head(n = 120)
fit <- model_data |> model(
  SepFit(value)
)
fit |> fitted()
fit |> residuals()
fct <- fit |> forecast()
fct |> accuracy(AirPassengers |>
  tsibble::as_tsibble())
fit |> report()
```
